name: panel
description: Gritbox is a pre-packaged and pre-configured Nette Framework application that you can use as the skeleton for your new applications.

scripts.build: rimraf www/scripts/dist www/styles/dist www/fonts/dist && NODE_ENV=production webpack
scripts.dev: rimraf www/scripts/dev www/styles/dev www/fonts/dev && NODE_ENV=development webpack
scripts.watch: rimraf www/scripts/dev www/styles/dev www/fonts/dev && NODE_ENV=development webpack --watch
